publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-650 Iain Smith: G8 Summit-That the Parliament supports the efforts of the Scottish Executive and others to make Scotland a regular venue for major international events; welcomes the news that Scotland is being considered as a potential venue for the G8 summit meeting; believes that such an event provides an excellent opportunity to promote Scotland on the world stage as well as providing economic benefits to local businesses, and believes that St Andrews would be an ideal venue for such an event.
